turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three three medium-size pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: barbecue chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want bbq chicken for all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, one veggie lover, and one's a plain pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 medium gluten free pizzas, 1 bbq chicken, 1 veggie lovers, and 1 supreme, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $60, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you confirm the price?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the pizza location?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you are ordering from Bella Luna, located on 123 main street and your order cost $60.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will it be ready for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizzas.
